FuncDef: The display qos headroom-usage command displays the headroom buffer usage. The display qos headroom-usage command displays the headroom buffer usage. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885-LL (low latency mode), CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
-
